ValidationRule.description: Permission Control must not reference more than one of the following: Resource, Region, Practice, Group, Project or Team
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF(ISBLANK(pse__Resource__c),0,1) + IF(ISBLANK(pse__Region__c),0,1) + IF(ISBLANK(pse__Practice__c),0,1) + IF(ISBLANK(pse__Group__c),0,1) + IF(ISBLANK(pse__Project__c),0,1) + IF(ISBLANK(pse__Team__c),0,1) > 1
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Permission Control must not reference more than one of the following: Resource, Region, Practice, Group, Project or Team
